agency.description: The agency acronym for Clinger Cohen Act agency, as defined by the United States Government Manual.

ifOther.description: A one- or two- sentence description of the measurement type used, if 'other' is selected as the value of 'method' field.

method.description: An enumerated list of methods for measuring the open source requirement.

items.description: A code.json object containing each versioned source code release made available.

releases.description: An array of code.json objects containing each versioned source code release made available.

version.description: The version of the metadata schema in use. Implements semantic versioning 2.0.0 rules as defined at http://semver.org.
